dmca.title: Canadian Company complains of defamation in usenet archives
dmca.body:
Listed below are the answers to the questions from the email you sent for you to before you will remove the prior discussed sites.


1) http://216.239.57.104/search?q=cache:G15MrUvjrsJ:www.calgaryfuroms.com/ntopic3913.html
and http://www2.usenetarchives.org/Dir54/File593.html

2)	Canada

[redacted]
dmca.sender_name: A Division of Phyl-Don Holdings and Management Ltd.
